Class SemiInfiniteTissueRegion

Namespace
Vts.MonteCarlo.Tissues
Assembly
Vts.dll

Implements ITissueRegion. Defines a layer infinite in extent along x,y-axes and with extent along z-axis given by ZRange.

public class SemiInfiniteTissueRegion : ITissueRegion

ContainsPosition(Position)

This checks which region photon is currently in.
inclusion defined in half-open interval [start,stop) so that continuum of layers do not overlap.

public bool ContainsPosition(Position position)

position Position

Position being checked

Returns

bool

True if photon in region, false if not

OnBoundary(Position)

Method to determine if photon on layer boundary. Needed to determine which boundary photon is on when layer region contains inclusion. Errors in Position accommodated for in test.
